snippet: The video, from Gardena, Calif., raises questions about whether the shooting was justified and illustrates the power of video to dispute the accounts of officers.
abstract: Release of video showing 2013 fatal police shooting of unarmed black man Ricardo Diaz-Zeferino in Gardena, Calif, is latest in string of incidents raising questions over police use of force.
lead_paragraph: The video, from Gardena, Calif., raises questions about whether the shooting was justified and illustrates the power of video to dispute the accounts of officers.

headline.main: Video of 2013 Police Shooting of Unarmed Man Renews Familiar Questions
headline.print_headline: Video of 2013 Police Shooting of Unarmed Man Renews Familiar Questions
